title: The real concept of luxury in Los Reyes
description:
Located in one the best areas in Los Reyes, this luxurious but welcoming property lies in a 3117m2 lot, and rises magnificently into a 3 storey palace, with more than 700m2. Just to have a look at the house´s surrounding areas is something really beautiful; fruit trees, BBQ ranch with Internet and cable TV outlets, a 100m2 swimming pool, green areas and a 2 car roof covered garage, are part of the exterior. On the inside, oil painted and stone made ceilings welcome you. Kitchen, dining and living room merge into a 140m2 space, fully covered in 1st quality marble. On the upper level, a 2-walk-in closet master bedroom, equipped with its own bathroom/jacuzzi and balcony, and 3 more spacious bedrooms, all with their own walkin closets, will form the resting area. This upper level is complemented with two more bathrooms. This house has enough space for a 4 car garage with automatic opening, located on the very first level. This incredible place gets its hot water from a solar system device, which can properly supply the entire house. A/C is set up accross the building, with separate controlling for independently climatized rooms. Quartz counters cover the entire kitchen, all bathrooms and the laundry room. Paradox alarm system with movement sensors support the house´s security, along with special double-lock door system and the Los Reyes surveillance personnel. One of the most impressive and appealing features of this house, is the independent apartment, thoughtfully located on the very first level. This lovely apartment has 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom, quartz-counter kitchen, living/dining room and swimming pool access.

900701001598

title: Terreno en Venta en Tarbaca un Entorno Natural y Tranquilo
description:
Tierra perfecta para una vida en contacto con la naturaleza

Descubra una oportunidad única en Tarbaca, un encantador distrito del cantón de Aserrí en la provincia de San José. Este amplio lote de 4.209 m² es el lugar perfecto para quienes buscan tranquilidad, naturaleza y la posibilidad de construir una casa en un entorno sereno, rodeado de la belleza natural que caracteriza a la zona.

Características del terreno:

Ventajas de la ubicación:

No dejes pasar esta oportunidad de invertir en un terreno que te ofrece la posibilidad de construir el futuro que siempre has soñado, en un lugar que combina lo mejor de la vida rural con el acceso a los servicios urbanos. ¡Contáctanos hoy para más información y agendar una visita!

title: Se vende espectacular casa
description:
Esta espectacular propiedad se ubica en las montañas de Heredia, con espectaculares vistas y un diseño constructivo que te cautivará desde la primera vez que entras por la puerta principal.

Tiene amplios espacios internos y una excelente iluminación interna, además de un terreno de más de 2000 metros cuadrados para realizar cualquier actividad que desees y para cualquier uso que desees.

Cuenta con diferentes áreas sociales como una gran sala de estar con hermosas lámparas y una grandiosa terraza.

Su habitación principal tiene un amplio walk-in-closet y un bello baño completo.

No pierdas la oportunidad de vivir en ésta increíble propiedad junto a tu familia.

40007501126

title: Hermosa casa en medio de la montaña llena de paz y tranquilidad
description:
Just 5 minutes from the Jaco Beach Center, you will find this gem of a property, full of peace, tranquility and nature, it is made up of 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, high ceilings, very spacious in all its areas, it has a beautiful terrace with mountain view.

It has a 15 meter long pool in the garden, ideal for relaxing and observing nature from a privileged point of view. The silence that accompanies this place is something magical, being just 5 minutes from Jaco and at the same time finding yourself immersed. In this atmosphere of tranquility, they make up a unique combination for nature lovers.

The construction is completely made of concrete, its design is unique, since it was made by a professional specialized in this area, fruit trees surround the property.

ESPAÑOL

A tan solo 5 minutos del Centro de Playa Jaco, se encuentra esta joya de propiedad, llena de paz, tranquilidad y naturaleza, esta conformada por 3 Habitaciones, 2 Baños completos, techos altos, muy espaciosa en todas sus areas, posee una bella terraza con vista a la montaña.

Tiene una piscina de 15 metros de largo en el jardin, ideal para relajarse y observar la naturaleza desde un punto de vista privilegiado, el silencio que acompaña a este lugar es algo magico, estar a tan solo 5 minutos de Jaco y a su vez encontrarse inmerso en esta admosfera de tranquilidad, conforman una combinacion unica para los amantes de la naturaleza.

La construccion es completamente de concreto, su diseño es unico, ya que lo hizo un profesional especializado en esta area, arboles frutales rodean la propiedad.

title: Perfect development property
description:
This lot is perfect for developing and it is located only minutes from the San Jose International airport and Downtown San Jose.  Property has amazing mountain views and sits only several blocks from the Cariari Country club and golf course, international mall, Hard Rock cafe and much more….

90070100159

title: APARTAMENTOS LISTOS EN BELLO HORIZONTE DE ESCAZÚ
description:
APARTMENTS IN BELLO HORIZONTE, ESCAZÚ

The life you deserve in the best location

AN OASIS IN THE MIDDLE OF THE CITY

Alta Pietra Residential Condominium: the best of two worlds

Nestled in one of Bello Horizonte’s green hills, Alta Pietra offers spectacular views of San Jose and its surroundings.  With its lush gardens and accessible location –only one Kilometer South of the main entrance to Bello Horizonte– the enclave’s apartments offer its residents a unique opportunity for urban conveniences in the midst of nature’s quiet stillness.

Apartments to suit your lifestyle

Alta Pietra offers a quiet luxury lifestyle in any of its one, two, and three-bedroom apartments.  With large expanses of glass, panoramic views permeate each of the living spaces, offering peace and tranquility at all times of day.  Accessed through a quiet road, Alta Pietra’s two six story towers rise from its cul-de-sac street, with its welcoming entry porches and a water feature to greet visitors.

Each of the two towers is equipped with a panoramic and a service elevator, and the luxury of only two or three apartments per floor.

Luxury inside and out

The lavish finishes in each of the apartments – Italian wooden doors, kitchen cabinets by Euromobilia, granite countertops, fine porcelain floors in the main living spaces, and wood floors in the bedrooms– go hand in hand with the beauty of the common areas, which include a covered terrace, sculptural infinity edge pool, jacuzzi and lush gardens throughout.

With 141 square meters, the few remaining two-bedroom apartments offer a large living space with integrated kitchen and dining areas. The spacious master bedroom features a full bathroom, a walk-in-closet and a balcony which can also be accessed from the living room. The second bedroom is equipped with a walk-in closet and is adjacent to a second full guest bathroom. The apartment includes a laundry room and underground parking.

Prices for remaining units are available upon request.

Additional Amenities

24-hour security

Closed circuit television (CCTV) monitoring

Automatic entrance to the underground garage

Trash chutes on each floor

Electrical generator

Heated pool and jacuzzi

Kohler bathroom accessories

Extralum Europa aluminum window system

Euromobilia Kitchen cabinets

Granite Countertops

Bticino electrical accessories

Fire alarm system

Children’s playground

APARTAMENTOS LISTOS EN BELLO HORIZONTE DE ESCAZÚ

La vida que usted merece en la mejor ubicación

UN OASIS EN MEDIO DE LA CIUDAD

Situado en una de las colinas de Bello Horizonte de Escazú, Alta Pietra le ofrece espectaculares vistas de San José y sus alrededores. Con sus exuberantes jardines y excelente ubicacion – a tan solo un kilómetro al sur de la entrada principal de Bello Horizonte– el

condominio ofrece a sus residentes la oportunidad de disfrutar de las facilidades de la vida urbana, y a la vez la paz y tranquilidad que inspira la naturaleza.

Amplios ventanales en cada uno de los apartamentos de una, dos o tres habitaciones aún disponibles en el complejo residencial, le permiten tener una vista panorámica y disfrutar cada amanecer y atardecer, con la paz y tranquilidad que ofrece una propiedad completamente cercada.

Lujo por dentro y por fuera

Los acabados de lujo al interior de cada uno de los apartamentos – con puertas de madera italianas, muebles de cocina de Euromobilia, sobres de granito, pisos de fino porcelanato en las áreas sociales y de almendro ingenieril en las habitaciones– van de la mano con la belleza de las áreas comunes, que incluyen rancho, espectacular piscina infinity edge, jacuzzi y hermosos jardines. También hay un área de juegos para niños en uno de los jardines.

Con un área aproximada de 141 m2, los apartamentos de dos habitaciones que aún quedan disponibles ofrecen una espaciosa área social, con cocina abierta al comedor. La amplia habitación principal incluye un baño completo y walk-in-closet, al igual que acceso a un hermoso balcón al que también se puede acceder desde la sala. El segundo dormitorio también tiene walk-in closet y se encuentra al lado del otro baño completo de la residencia. El apartamento también tiene cuarto de pilas y cuenta con parqueos en el garaje subterráneo.

Consulta los precios de las unidades que aún quedan disponibles.

Otros Servicios

Seguridad las 24 horas.

Acceso automático al garaje subterráneo.

Ductos de basura en cada piso.

Planta eléctrica.

Piscina y jacuzzi con calefacción.

Accesorios de baño marca Kohler.

Ventanas Extralum sistema Europa con marcos de aluminio

Cocinas de Euromobilia.

Sobres de granito.

Accesorios eléctricos Bticino.

Sistema de alarma contra incendios.

Área de juegos para niños

40007191558

title: Hermoso Hostel en Jaco
description:
Casa Hostel con esas características suena como una excelente oportunidad de inversión para aquellos interesados en el negocio turístico y el alquiler de hospedaje.

La cantidad de dormitorios y baños disponibles (8 dormitorios y 7 baños) proporciona una gran capacidad para alojar a múltiples huéspedes al mismo tiempo, lo que es muy atractivo para grupos grandes o turistas que viajan en conjunto. La diversidad de baños también garantiza comodidad y privacidad para los visitantes.

La presencia de una piscina y un gimnasio agrega valor a la propiedad, ya que muchos huéspedes buscan servicios y comodidades adicionales durante su estancia. Tener estas instalaciones puede hacer que la Casa Hostel sea aún más atractiva para los turistas y viajeros que buscan relajarse y mantenerse activos.

El parqueo para 6 vehículos es otra ventaja importante, especialmente si el área cercana a la playa es turística y concurrida. Ofrecer estacionamiento seguro y conveniente es un punto positivo para atraer más huéspedes que llegan en automóvil.

La ubicación cercana a la playa es un gran atractivo, ya que muchas personas buscan alojamientos que estén a poca distancia de las playas para disfrutar de unas vacaciones relajantes junto al mar.

En resumen, una Casa Hostel con estas características es una excelente inversión para aquellos que desean generar ingresos a través del turismo y la hospitalidad. La capacidad para albergar a grupos grandes, las instalaciones adicionales y la ubicación estratégica cerca de la playa hacen que esta propiedad sea atractiva tanto para los viajeros como para los inversionistas interesados en obtener buenos retornos de su inversión.

INGLES

A Casa Hostel with these features sounds like an excellent investment opportunity for those interested in the tourism business and rental accommodation.

The number of bedrooms and bathrooms available (8 bedrooms and 7 bathrooms) provides a large capacity to accommodate multiple guests at the same time, which is very attractive for large groups or tourists travelling together. The diversity of bathrooms also ensures comfort and privacy for visitors.

The presence of a swimming pool and a gym adds value to the property, as many guests seek additional services and amenities during their stay. Having these facilities can make the Casa Hostel even more attractive to tourists and travellers looking to relax and stay active.

Parking for 6 vehicles is another important advantage, especially if the area near the beach is touristy and busy. Offering safe and convenient parking is a plus point to attract more guests arriving by car.

The location close to the beach is a great attraction, as many people are looking for accommodation that is within walking distance of the beaches for a relaxing holiday by the sea.

In short, a Casa Hostel with these characteristics is an excellent investment for those who wish to generate income through tourism and hospitality. The ability to accommodate large groups, the additional facilities and the strategic location close to the beach make this property attractive to both travellers and investors interested in earning good returns on their investment.

title: Villa Escazu & Gardens-Furnished
description:
Villa Escazu is conveniently located in Escazu within five minutes of the city center. Escazu is a hub for local urban activity and living. The chalet-style home is 9 minutes or less to private schools, shopping malls, and fine restaurants, including CIMA Hospital. Nestled in trees and gently sloping hills, tenants benefit from the convenience of its location while enjoying the seclusion and tranquility that the surrounding nature provides. The property borders a small creek giving it an additional pleasing feature of escape from the city noise.

Villa Escazu has great potential and could be used as a large family home or center for medical recovery, physical and/or occupational therapy, massage, and yoga retreats due to the size and layout of the home. This property has ample room for expansion and sits on a 3,590 square meter lot to which more cabins, small villas, or homes could be built. It is zoned for a medium-density residential project, an additional 5 more large houses are allowed and it has been approved for development to build a 4th floor. At present, it has 450 square meters of construction.

Built with rainforest hardwoods that would be impossible to build with today, the villa has three stories, with 4 bedrooms on the upper levels and two private-entrance studio apartments on the ground floor. The third floor features a large bedroom with an adjacent office or sleeping space, including a walk-in closet and sitting area. It shares a bathroom with an additional bedroom. There are two more bedrooms on the second level which also share a bathroom. The large living room has a pumice stone wall chimney and fireplace; perfect for the cooler nights. The dining room fits a long dining table that has space to host 12 or more guests. The view of the surrounding gardens adds to the magical dining experience. With the kitchen directly connected, it is an ideal space for special gatherings. A large covered wrap-around terrace runs parallel to the living room, kitchen, and dining room so both family and guests can finish the evening activities with cocktails while watching the sunset on the horizon. It is adorned with beautiful warm woods throughout the home and features luxurious staircases and catwalks. There is a covered veranda, two-car enclosed garage, laundry room, and ample storage closets throughout. Additional driveway provides enough area for more than 10 cars. A separate shed is located close to the home. The layout could be easily reconfigured into a facility for up to eight tenants. There are few homes in the city conveniently located with this much charm.

400071589005

The third floor features a large bedroom with an adjacent office or sleeping space, including a walk-in closet and sitting area. It shares a bathroom with an additional bedroom. There are two more bedrooms on the second level which also share a bathroom. The large living room has a pumice stone wall chimney and fireplace; perfect for the cooler nights. The dining room fits a long dining table that has space to host 12 or more guests. The view of the surrounding gardens adds to the magical dining experience. With the kitchen directly connected, it is an ideal space for special gatherings. A large covered wrap-around terrace runs parallel to the living room, kitchen, and dining room so both family and guests can finish the evening activities with cocktails while watching the sunset on the horizon. It is adorned with beautiful warm woods throughout the home and features luxurious staircases and catwalks. There is a covered veranda, two-car enclosed garage, laundry room, and ample storage closets throughout. Additional driveway provides enough area for more than 10 cars. A separate shed is located close to the home. The layout could be easily reconfigured into a facility for up to eight tenants. There are few homes in the city conveniently located with this much charm.

400071589005

title: 30% de Descuento Condominio Lomas del Valle
description:
Aproveche 30% de Descuento en Condominio Lomas del Valle!

Lomas del Valle is an exclusive condominium in the prime location of Costa Rica, consisting of 24 ready-to-develop lots. This condominium is strategically situated between Atenas and Orotina, ensuring easy access to all public services and a privileged location just 40 minutes from San Jose and the beaches of Jacó. It is part of a residential complex spanning over 100 hectares, offering lots and condominiums of various sizes for urbanization and building your dream home.

Located at an elevation of 660 meters on a mountain, Lomas del Valle enjoys Costa Rica's finest climate and offers breathtaking views of the sea and mountains. The surroundings are surrounded by natural reserves, creating a peaceful and secure environment, ideal for those seeking a family retreat and a place to relax.

The condominium comprises 24 lots ranging from 600m2 to 1500m2. The condominium has all the necessary permits and is ready for construction. Lomas del Valle  represents a unique opportunity to acquire a slice of paradise in one of Costa Rica's most coveted locations.

Lomas del Valle es un exclusivo condominio en la mejor zona de Costa Rica: consiste de 24 lotes listos para desarrollar. Este condominio se encuentra estratégicamente ubicado entre Atenas y Orotina, lo que garantiza fácil acceso a todos los servicios públicos y una ubicación privilegiada a tan solo 40 minutos de San José y las playas de Jacó. Es parte de un complejo residencial de más de 100ha de lotes y condominios de distintos tamaños para urbanizar y construir la casa de sus sueños.

Situado a una altitud de 660 metros en una montaña, Lomas del Valle goza del mejor clima de Costa Rica y ofrece vistas espectaculares al mar y las montañas. El entorno está rodeado de reservas naturales, creando un ambiente tranquilo y seguro, ideal para aquellos que buscan una casa de descanso y retiro para disfrutar en familia.

El condominio tiene 24 lotes entre 600m2 a 1500m2. En condominio cuenta con todos los permisos necesarios y está listo para la construcción. Lomas del Valle es una oportunidad única para adquirir un pedazo de paraíso en una de las ubicaciones más codiciadas de Costa Rica.

title: ESPECTACULAR CASA DE LUJO EN PLAYA JACO
description:
Esta preciosa propiedad de lujo, se encuentra a tan solo 300 metros de la playa y de los principales comercios de Jaco, la propiedad poseee una decoracion tipo asiatica, una privacidad total, jacuzzi, terraza, bar y lindos jardines, piscina, cocina totalmente equipada y lavandero con centro de lavanderia.

Los acabados exclusivos y de lujo le brindan una valor unico a esta propiedad, actualmente es usada para alquiler en AIRBNB y tiene el 96,9% de ocupacion, lo que la hace muy rentable.

ENGLISH

This beautiful luxury property is located just 300 meters from the beach and the main shops in Jaco, the property has Asian-style decoration, total privacy, jacuzzi, terrace, bar and beautiful gardens, swimming pool, fully equipped kitchen and laundry room with laundry center. The exclusive and luxury finishes provide a unique value to this property, it is currently used for rent on AIRBNB and has 96.9% occupancy, which makes it very profitable.

title: Luxury Mansion . Impressive views & Rental Income
description: One of a kind Luxury hillside mansion with vacation rental income, this property can be utilized as a 2 single 7 and 6 bedroom houses or can be used as one large home with 13 fully furnished bedrooms.  Property also has 2 independent, 2 bedroom apartments.  This property comes fully furnished and has a classy modern design look and feel.  This is a very profitable vacation rental business nestled in the cool mountains of Bello Horizonte in the upscale neighborhood of Escazú.  This property has a very attractive capitalization rate of over 12% and is priced to sell at US$1,300,000. The property sits on a 733 square meters of land and overlooks the San José Central valley. Total construction of the hotel is of 2,100 square meters, which includes 13 rooms, 2 fully equipped bar areas, 4 fully equipped kitchens, workers apartment, pools, all rooms are equipped with air conditioning units, flat screen TV’s, lush linens, modern décors and much more.  Property comes fully furnished. Owner financing is available!

Owner financing is available!

title: Cozy Condo N.3. El Encanto Condominium. Jaco Center!
description:
Beautiful small condo with 2 bedrooms and 1 bathroom, located on the first level of the Complex. Well decorated and fully furnished! Your little nest in Jaco center near very popular Hotels, stores, restaurants and businesses in town. Great opportunity for your main home or your vacation property. Walking distance to the beach!

Common areas with tables and chairs, pool and barbecue space.

HOA $196.88/monthly. No PETS allowed.

Hermoso condominio acogedor de 2 habitaciones y 1 baño, ubicado en el primer nivel del Complejo. ¡Bien decorado y completamente amueblado! Su pequeño nido en el centro de Jaco, cerca de hoteles, tiendas, restaurantes y negocios muy populares del pueblo. Gran oportunidad para su vivienda principal o su propiedad vacacional. ¡A poca distancia de la playa! Áreas comunes con mesas y sillas, piscina y espacio de parrilla.

HOA $196,88/mensual. No se permiten mascotas.

title: LINDA CASA EN OROTINA
description: Espaciosa casa en Orotina, la casa posee 3 Habitaciones y 3 Baños, es bastante grande y espaciosa, esta construida en un lote de 844 Metros cuadrados, se pueden construir apartamentos para alquiler, ya que la zona es muy centrica y cercana a los principales comercios del centro de Orotina, a tan solo 30 minutos de la capital y de la costa pacifica. Tiene parqueo para varios carros.

title: Apartamento en Escazú
description:
Si eres amante del modernismo, la amplitud y el buen gusto, estos apartamentos te harán suspirar ...

En San Rafael de Escazú hay dos torres de condominios para que su familia e invitados disfruten de muchas comodidades e impresionantes vistas.

Los apartamentos están diseñados para cumplir todos tus hermosos deseos y más!!

Este exclusivo condominio cuenta con piscina, jacuzzi, casa club y sendero para caminar.

Disponemos de 3 modelos de apartamentos que van desde los 86.00 m² hasta los 183.00 m² y un penthouse de 236.00 m².

* Año de construcción: 2018.

Precios entre los $176,992 a $621,249.

Consulta los precios de las unidades que aún quedan disponibles.

Otros Servicios

Seguridad las 24 horas.

Acceso automático al garaje subterráneo.

Ductos de basura en cada piso.

Planta eléctrica.

Piscina y jacuzzi con calefacción.

Accesorios de baño marca Kohler.

Ventanas Extralum sistema Europa con marcos de aluminio

Cocinas de Euromobilia.

Sobres de granito.

Accesorios eléctricos Bticino.

Sistema de alarma contra incendios.

If you are a lover of modernism, spaciousness and good taste, these apartments will make you sigh...

In San Rafael de Escazú there are two condominium towers for your family and guests to enjoy many amenities and impressive views. The apartments are designed to fulfill all your beautiful desires and more !!

This exclusive condominium has a pool, jacuzzi, clubhouse and walking path. We have 3 apartment models ranging from 86.00 m² to 183.00 m² and a 236.00 m² penthouse. *

Year of construction: 2018.

Prices between $176,992 to $621,249.

Check the prices of the units that are still available.

Other services 24 hour security.

Automatic access to the underground garage.

Garbage chutes on each floor.

Power plant. Heated pool and jacuzzi.

Kohler brand bathroom accessories.

Extralum windows Europa system with aluminum frames

Euromobilia kitchens.

Granite tops.

Bticino electrical accessories.

Fire alarm system.
